page.title: 12BUCHLYVIE COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: The first{BUCHLYVIE COMMUNITY COUNCIL was formed in{1978}with seven members elected by ballot. The Council meets quarterly to discuss village matters and residents may bring items which concern them for consideration and possible action. One of the primary tasks which the council has undertaken since its inception is that of improving the appearance and amenities of the village. With this objective in mind, a number of small projects have been undertaken. Trees, shrubs, bulbs, and heathers have been planted in various sites in and around the village and large tubs and containers of flowers situated in suitable spots. Residents responded by putting window boxes and hanging baskets outside their homes with the result that Buchlyvie won an award as{THE BEST {KEPT VILLAGE IN THE WEST OF SCOTLAND.
